sentence: The trip is especially meaningful for Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick, R-Pa., who lived in Ukraine when he was an FBI agent.

title: Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick heads to Ukraine border: 'I will go as far as ... they will allow me to go'

sentence: The new sanctions list also excluded Foreign Affairs Committee Chairman Gregory Meeks (D-NY), House Intelligence Committee Chair Adam Schiff (D-CA), House Judiciary Chair Jerry Nadler (D-NY), Reps.
